description: This recipe, from the chef Norman Van Aken, came to The Times in 2001 as part of a story about the raw food movement, in which every element of every dish is raw, organic and vegan -- no meat, fish, eggs or dairy products.
title: Marinated Shaved Fennel with Avocado and Minneola Tangelos
title_page: Marinated Shaved Fennel with Avocado and Minneola Tangelos Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This recipe, from the chef Norman Van Aken, came to The Times in 2001 as part of a story about the raw food movement, in which every element of every dish is raw, organic and vegan -- no meat, fish, eggs or dairy products.
Featured in: Raw Sophistication: The Great Cooks Discover Noncooking.
